## Processing Data

```{r}
# Load libraries
library(corrplot)
```

```{r}
setwd("~/Documents/GitHub/STAT301-3-regression")
source("model/XGBoost/xgboost_setup.R")
```

```{r}
# split 20% of training data for EDA
training_data <- train[indicesTrain, ]

fractionEDA <- 0.20
sampleSizeEDA <- floor(fractionEDA * nrow(training_data))

indicesEDA <- sort(sample(seq_len(nrow(training_data)), size=sampleSizeEDA))
EDA_data <- training_data[indicesEDA, ]
```


## Explore data

```{r}
EDA_data %>% 
  summarise_all(funs(
    sum(is.na(.)) / length(.)
  ))
```

```{r}
EDA_data %>% 
  select_if(is.numeric) %>% 
  cor() %>% 
  corrplot()
```

```{r}
EDA_data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(money_made_inv)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
